channel.title: linux常用命令 on 冯小小，一个开发者

item.title: curl参数详解
item.description: curl参数详解 Common Options -#, --progress-bar Make curl display a simple progress bar instead of the more informational standard meter. -b, --cookie <name=data> Supply cookie with request. If no =, then specifies the cookie file to use (see -c). -c, --cookie-jar <file name> File to save response cookies to. -d, --data <data> Send specified data in POST request. Details provided below. -f, --fail Fail
